definition: to do one's utmost
to overturn/to collapse/to lean/to tend/to incline/to pour out
surname Li
power/force/strength/ability/strenuously

sentences.english: Inner Mongolia's Xilingol named 'Capital of Horses' .
sentences.chinese: 内蒙古锡林郭勒盟倾力打造“中国马都”。

sentences.english: To be a true follower of Christ, he had to devote his life to serving others.
sentences.chinese: 要成为上帝真正的追随者，他必须倾力服务他人。

sentences.english: In addition, Haier strives to build up the credit of "It is proper to live in the low-carbon city".
sentences.chinese: 另外，海尔倾力打造低碳宜居城市的强烈信念。

sentences.english: As you know in business people talk a lot but at the end of the day the results are poor.
sentences.chinese: 你该知道，在商场上，倾力商谈者多，促有成效者少。

sentences.english: Snow spray is the latest product developed by Eternal Starworld.
sentences.chinese: 造雪机是铭星世界倾力开发的最新产品。

sentences.english: This is the Jilin Petrochemical effort to build low-carbon "construction" one series of initiatives.
sentences.chinese: 这是吉林石化倾力打造低碳“建设年”系列举措之一。

definition: (honorific) your kind efforts/thanks to your help
to spare no effort (idiom); to do one's utmost
with all one's strength/full strength/all-out (effort)/fully (support)
to cheer/to root for
jointly/as a group/together
to unite in common effort
lit. to join hands/to act together
to join forces/to give full cooperation
to spare no pains or effort (idiom); to do one's utmost
hand in hand/to join hands/to collaborate
large sum of money
to put effort into (work, farming, writing etc)/a masterpiece
heart's blood/expenditure (for some project)/meticulous care
to exhaust one's thoughts and ingenuity (idiom); to think sth through thoroughly/to rack one's brains/to leave no stone unturned
(idiom) to safeguard (sth)/to protect (sth)
to help one another/to come to sb's help
